changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Mise à jour liste des commandes pour Jee: Update command list for Jeedom v4.3
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour configurer les a: Addition of an option to configure the subscriptions to be activated when calculating routes (see documentation
changelog.md.Ajout d'une option pour utiliser n'impor: Added option to use any command from any plugin as start or end position
changelog.md.Correction de l'extraction des infos de: Fixed extracting trip info due to a Waze API change
changelog.md.Ajout de la présentation en mode tableau: Addition of the presentation in equipment table mode (Jeedom v4.2
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la page de conf: New presentation of the configuration page
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects in the equipment page
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des co: New presentation of the list of orders
changelog.md.Ajout du support de la géolocalisation c: Added support for geolocation configured in the Jeedom core
changelog.md.Ajout d'un cron d'auto-actualisation per: Addition of a personalized auto-update cron in the equipment config; attention you must reconfigure your equipment because the cron30 is disabled; Otherwise, the refresh of journeys will no longer be carried out automatically
changelog.md.Correction de l'extraction des infos dû: Fixed info extraction due to Waze API change
changelog.md.Amélioration du widget pour jeedom v4: Improvement of the widget for jeedom v4
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le widget en jeedo: Bug correction on the widget in jeedom v4

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'avoir les infos de tr: This plugin allows you to have the trip info (traffic taken into account) via Waze
index.md.Ce plugin peut ne plus marcher si Waze n: This plugin may no longer work if Waze no longer accepts that we interrogate its site
index.md.Afin d'utiliser le plugin, vous devez le: In order to use the plugin, you must download, install and activate it like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.Suite à cela il vous faudra créer votre: After that you will have to create your trip (s)
index.md.Rendez vous dans le menu plugins\/organi: Go to the plugins / organization menu, you will find the Waze in Time plugin there
index.md.Ensuite vous arriverez sur la page qui l: Then you will arrive on the page which will list your equipment (you can have several Routes) and which will allow you to create it by clicking the "Add" button
index.md.Vous arriverez ensuite sur la page de co: You will then arrive on the configuration page of your Trip
index.md.Sur cette page vous trouverez trois sect: On this page you will find three sections
index.md.Vous trouverez dans cette section toutes: In this section you will find all jeedom configurations
index.md.A savoir le nom de votre équipement, l'o: Namely the name of your equipment, the object to which you want to associate it, the category, if you want the equipment to be active or not, and if you want it to be visible on the dashboard
index.md.Pour finir, il vous reste à configurer,: Finally, you have to configure, if you wish, the auto-update
index.md.Si vous ne configurez rien, les informat: If you do not configure anything, the trip information will not be updated automatically
index.md.Cette section est une des plus important: This section is one of the most important and allows you to set the starting and ending point
index.md.Ces infos doivent être les latitudes et: These infos must be the latitudes and longitudes of the positions
index.md.Elles peuvent être retrouvées en utilisa: They can be found using the site provided by clicking on the page link (just enter an address and click on get GPS coordinates
index.md.Il est possible de les fournir par plusi: It is possible to provide them by several means
index.md.manuellement, vous devez alors encoder d: manually, you must then directly encode the latitude and longitude
index.md.via une commande info d'un autre plugin: via an info command from another Jeedom plugin, you must then select the command which must return the information in the format 'latitude, longitude
index.md.via la config Jeedom (voir menu configur: via the Jeedom config (see Jeedom configuration menu
index.md.en sélectionnant directement une command: by directly selecting a command from the geoloc or geoloc_ios plugin if these plugins exist (this option should no longer be used for new equipment, prefer the command selection option explained above
index.md.Il est également possible de sélectionne: It is also possible to select the subscriptions that must be activated when calculating the journey
index.md.Il faut y mettre une liste de valeur sép: You must put a list of values separated by a comma or _ * _ to activate everything
index.md.Cette configuration permet simplement de: This configuration simply allows you to hide the selected trips in the widget on the dashboard, they will still be updated when the equipment is refreshed
index.md.Toutes ces commandes sont disponibles vi: All these commands are available via scenarios and via the dashboard
index.md.Le bouton en haut à droite permet de raf: The button at the top right refreshes the info
index.md.Toutes les infos sont visibles (pour les: All information is visible (for trips, if the trip is long, it can be truncated but the full version is visible by leaving the mouse on it
index.md.Les infos sont rafraîchies selon la conf: The information is refreshed according to the auto-update configuration of the equipment
index.md.Si rien n'est configuré, les trajets ne: If nothing is configured, the trips will never be updated automatically
index.md.Vous pouvez les rafraîchir à la demande: You can refresh them on demand via scenario with the refresh command, or via the dashboard with the double arrows
